text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Would you call Trumps COVID-19 response a glowing success? You assholes investigated everything about the Obama Administration. You could find nothing. Trump's ignorance has cost people their lives. When you cause someone else's death, what do they call that?
